column4: is there is power manager for laptops where u can control performance of laptop battery like windows ?
you mean set the processor to a lower speed when on battery?
yeah my laptop heat is high , and i want to put it down , it is 93 C degree , so , how can i customize my laptop performance even on battery or AC Power
that is too high a temperature, are you booting off with 'idle=poll'?
never mind, what is the make model?
the gnome power manager dont show much details ! ,
the fan speed became low when i used ubuntu , it was high on windows
I found this app called 'ubuntu-tweak' it should have what you are looking for(set the cpu governor for BATT/AC), but you have fundamental heat problem, you should address that
hello , i have program in .tar.gz file , how to install it ?
does compiz run faster/better with Xgl?
i have graphics card sis , 64mb , does it support ubuntu graphic ?
lost my net connection, did you figure out the heat problem?
no not yet :( ,  can u help my friend , he have sis grahics card , 64 mb does it support ubuntu graphics ?
it should there is a sis driver
so ubuntu dont get driver automatically ?
